name: Tales of Karmirosa
description:
August 6, 1954

You are  in the 6th military-research base in your home country of Arkelas, currently occupied by Karmirosa. You have successfully infiltrated the first section of the base, but the alarm  got off and now the enemy is on high alert. Your objective is to gather the documents about the secret nuclear weapon project. Be prepared for the unexpected Richard!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Jumping - Space

Run - Left Shift

Shoot - Left Mouse Button
